game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map leads you to an old ruin deep in the jungle, where the lost artifact is said to be hidden. Retrieve it and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You need to explore the jungle and find the hidden entrance to the ancient ruins.

task.objective: Explore the ruins for the artifact
task.description: Once inside, search the ruins carefully for any clues leading to the artifact's location.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian and claim the artifact
task.description: A powerful ancient guardian protects the artifact. You must defeat it to take the artifact.
